metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25314 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, there is an integer overflow incopyString.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.7
libexpat1 - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-3ubuntu0.7').
xmlrpc-c: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
